text: This theme has the vibes. Sonic Unleashed easily has one of my favorite soundtracks in the whole series which is full of great music, and I still listen to Cool Edge (Night) regularly. Now that we finally got an awesome entry with Sonic Mania, I'm excited to see the next game being announced.
